alert.note: Alert for Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 20 at 5:19PM CDT until June 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GARDEN AND SOUTH CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 418 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Antioch, or 21 miles east of Alliance, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Snow Lake, Wickson Lake, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 12. Highway 2 between mile markers 99 and 128. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
